tit.e: Maegahata-toge Pass (a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Maegahata-toge Pass (a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City)

sen.j: 前ヶ畑峠（まえがはたとうげ）は京都府京都市左京区内にある国道上の峠である。
sen.e: Maegahata-toge Pass is a pass on a national highway in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Maegahata-toge Pass is a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Maegahata-toge Pass is a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 標高627mの国道477号上にある峠である。
sen.e: It is 627m above sea level and it is on National Highway 477.
It is the pass located in National Route 477 at an altitude of 627 meters.
It is the pass located in National Route 477 at an altitude of 627 meters.

sen.j: 京都市内の大原小出石町と大原百井町を隔てている。
sen.e: It forms a border between Ohara-Kodeishi-cho (Kyoto City) and Ohara-Momoi-cho (Kyoto City).
It separates Ohara-Kodeishi-cho and Ohara-Momoi-cho in Kyoto City.
It separates Ohara-Kodeishi-cho and Ohara-Momoi-cho in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 滋賀県大津市から百井集落に至るにはこの峠を越える必要があり、鞍馬山を越えていく。
sen.e: Once residents in Otsu City (Shiga Prefecture) had to clime the pass and Mt. Kurama to come to Momoi Village (present Ohara-Momoi-cho).
To reach Momoi Settlement from Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture, it requires to get over the pass and Mt. Kurama.
sen.cmt: 表現を変えました。requires→it requires
sen.e: To reach Momoi Settlement from Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture, it requires to get over the pass and Mt. Kurama.

sen.j: この先には500m級の峠がこの峠も含めて3か所連続する国道としては異例の山岳地帯となっており、酷道のレポートを趣味としている者には有名なスポットとなっている。
sen.e: Unlike normal national highways, there are two more 500m-above-sea-level passes in a row and the winding road runs the mountainous area, so National Highway 477 is quite popular to the people who enjoy writing reports on bad roads.
sen.cmt: *醜道こくどうSome road nerds love bad roads, they have the passion for research on bad roads and enjoy complaining or lecturing driving ‘strategy’.
sen.e: Unlike normal national routes, it is a mountainous area which has three 500-meter-high passes continuously ahead, including the Pass, and it is quite popular to the people who enjoy writing reports on bad roads.

The road passes through an unusually mountainous area with a series of three 500-meter-high passes, including the Maegahata-toge Pass, making this area quite popular with those who are interested in writing reports on tough roads.
sen.cmt: 全体的に変更しました。bad roads→tough roads

sen.j: 峠前後は1.2車線程度と、国道としては非常に狭い道路である。
sen.e: Unlike normal national highways, the road is only 1.2 lanes wide around the pass.
The road is only 1.2 lanes wide around the pass, which is very narrow for the national routes.
The road is only 1.2 lanes wide around the pass, which is very narrow for the national routes.

sen.j: 車両での通行は可能だが、大原側が急勾配となっている。
sen.e: Normal cars can run through it, however, drivers have to be careful of the steep slopes on Ohara side of the pass.
Although vehicles can run through it, the Ohara side is very steep.
Although vehicles can run through it, the Ohara side is very steep.

sen.j: また、峠の前後には百井峠、花脊峠という2つの500m級の峠を越え、途中に国道477号百井別れという難所も存在する。
sen.e: Besides, near the pass (on the same road) there are other 500m-above-sea-level passes (Momoi-toge Pass and Hanase-toge Pass) and a famous T-junction 'National Highway 477 Momoi-wakare', so it is very difficult to drive around the pass.

Besides, the Road runs through two 500-meter-high passes ahead and behind of the pass, Momoi-toge Pass and Hanase-toge Pass respectively, and it has a chokepoint, called National Route 477 Momoi-wakare curve, on the way.

Besides, the Road runs through two 500-meter-high passes ahead and behind of the pass, Momoi-toge Pass and Hanase-toge Pass respectively, and it has a chokepoint, called National Route 477 Momoi-wakare curve, on the way.

sen.j: このため、この峠を利用する人は限られている。
sen.e: For that reason, only… seems to choose the pass.
Consequently, people who use the pass are limited.
sen.cmt: 文章が欠落していたため、ウェブから原文補足し、訳文修正しました。
sen.e: Consequently, people who use the pass are limited.

sen.j: 途中越（京都府京都市・滋賀県大津市）
sen.e: Tochu-goe Pass (Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture/Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture)
Tochu-goe Pass (Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture)
Tochu-goe Pass (Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture)

sen.j: 百井峠（京都府京都市左京区）
sen.e: Momoi-toge Pass (Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture)
Momoi-toge Pass (Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture)
Momoi-toge Pass (Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture)
